mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, lecture_code, lecture_name, professor_id, grade, classroom, division, lecture_time, lecture_year, semester, student_count, student_full, credit, section, dept_code, remarks from (select l.lecture_code, l.lecture_name, l.professor_id, l.grade, l.classroom, l.division, l.lecture_time, l.lecture_year, l.semester, l.student_count, l.student_full, l.credit, l.section, l.dept_code, l.remarks from lecture l ) where rownum <= (#{cri.pageNum}*#{cri.amount})) where rn > ((#{cri.pageNum}-1)*#{cri.amount})
